sup_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
#print sup_le /-
theorem sup_le (K₁ K₂ : Compacts G) : μ («expr ⊔ » K₁ K₂) ≤ μ K₁ + μ K₂ :=
  by
  simp only [apply_eq_coe_to_fun]
  norm_cast
  exact μ.sup_le' _ _
#align sup_le sup_le
-/
sup_disjoint:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
theorem sup_disjoint (K₁ K₂ : Compacts G) (h : Disjoint (K₁ : Set G) K₂) : μ («expr ⊔ » K₁ K₂) = μ K₁ + μ K₂ := by
  simp [apply_eq_coe_to_fun, μ.sup_disjoint' _ _ h]
#align sup_disjoint sup_disjoint
outer_measure_preimage:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
theorem outer_measure_preimage (f : «expr ≃ₜ » G G) (h : ∀ ⦃K : Compacts G⦄, μ (K.map f f.continuous) = μ K)
    (A : Set G) : μ.outer_measure («expr ⁻¹' » f A) = μ.outer_measure A :=
  by
  refine'
    induced_outer_measure_preimage _ μ.inner_content_Union_nat μ.inner_content_mono _ (fun s => f.is_open_preimage) _
  intro s hs; convert μ.inner_content_comap f h ⟨s, hs⟩
#align outer_measure_preimage outer_measure_preimage
outer_measure_pos_of_is_mul_left_invaria:
@[to_additive]
theorem outer_measure_pos_of_is_mul_left_invariant [Group G] [TopologicalGroup G]
    (h3 : ∀ (g : G) {K : Compacts G}, μ (K.map _ <| continuous_mul_left g) = μ K) (K : Compacts G) (hK : μ K ≠ 0)
    {U : Set G} (h1U : IsOpen U) (h2U : U.nonempty) : 0 < μ.outer_measure U :=
  by
  convert μ.inner_content_pos_of_is_mul_left_invariant h3 K hK ⟨U, h1U⟩ h2U
  exact μ.outer_measure_opens ⟨U, h1U⟩
#align outer_measure_pos_of_is_mul_left_invariant outer_measure_pos_of_is_mul_left_invariant
outer_measure_opens:
theorem outer_measure_opens (U : Opens G) : μ.outer_measure U = μ.inner_content U :=
  inducedOuterMeasure_eq' (fun _ => isOpen_unionᵢ) μ.inner_content_Union_nat μ.inner_content_mono U.2
#align outer_measure_opens outer_measure_opens
outer_measure_of_is_open:
theorem outer_measure_of_is_open (U : Set G) (hU : IsOpen U) : μ.outer_measure U = μ.inner_content ⟨U, hU⟩ :=
  μ.outer_measure_opens ⟨U, hU⟩
#align outer_measure_of_is_open outer_measure_of_is_open
outer_measure_lt_top_of_is_compact:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
theorem outer_measure_lt_top_of_is_compact [LocallyCompactSpace G] {K : Set G} (hK : IsCompact K) :
    μ.outer_measure K < ennreal.top :=
  by
  rcases exists_compact_superset hK with ⟨F, h1F, h2F⟩
  calc
    μ.outer_measure K ≤ μ.outer_measure (interior F) := outer_measure.mono' _ h2F
    _ ≤ μ ⟨F, h1F⟩ := by apply μ.outer_measure_le ⟨interior F, isOpen_interior⟩ ⟨F, h1F⟩ interior_subset
    _ < «expr⊤» := μ.lt_top _
    
#align outer_measure_lt_top_of_is_compact outer_measure_lt_top_of_is_compact
outer_measure_le:
theorem outer_measure_le (U : Opens G) (K : Compacts G) (hUK : (U : Set G) ⊆ K) : μ.outer_measure U ≤ μ K :=
  (μ.outer_measure_opens U).le.trans <| μ.inner_content_le U K hUK
#align outer_measure_le outer_measure_le
outer_measure_interior_compacts:
theorem outer_measure_interior_compacts (K : Compacts G) : μ.outer_measure (interior K) ≤ μ K :=
  (μ.outer_measure_opens <| Opens.interior K).le.trans <| μ.inner_content_le _ _ interior_subset
#align outer_measure_interior_compacts outer_measure_interior_compacts
outer_measure_exists_open:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
theorem outer_measure_exists_open {A : Set G} (hA : μ.outer_measure A ≠ ennreal.top) {ε : nnreal} (hε : ε ≠ 0) :
    ∃ U : Opens G, A ⊆ U ∧ μ.outer_measure U ≤ μ.outer_measure A + ε :=
  by
  rcases induced_outer_measure_exists_set _ _ μ.inner_content_mono hA (ENNReal.coe_ne_zero.2 hε) with ⟨U, hU, h2U, h3U⟩
  exact ⟨⟨U, hU⟩, h2U, h3U⟩; swap; exact μ.inner_content_Union_nat
#align outer_measure_exists_open outer_measure_exists_open
outer_measure_exists_compact:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
theorem outer_measure_exists_compact {U : Opens G} (hU : μ.outer_measure U ≠ ennreal.top) {ε : nnreal} (hε : ε ≠ 0) :
    ∃ K : Compacts G, (K : Set G) ⊆ U ∧ μ.outer_measure U ≤ μ.outer_measure K + ε :=
  by
  rw [μ.outer_measure_opens] at hU⊢
  rcases μ.inner_content_exists_compact hU hε with ⟨K, h1K, h2K⟩
  exact ⟨K, h1K, le_trans h2K <| add_le_add_right (μ.le_outer_measure_compacts K) _⟩
#align outer_measure_exists_compact outer_measure_exists_compact
outer_measure_eq_infi:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
theorem outer_measure_eq_infi (A : Set G) :
    μ.outer_measure A =
      «expr⨅ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , »"
        (μ.inner_content ⟨U, hU⟩) :=
  inducedOuterMeasure_eq_infᵢ _ μ.inner_content_Union_nat μ.inner_content_mono A
#align outer_measure_eq_infi outer_measure_eq_infi
outer_measure_caratheodory:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `measurable_set_of -/
theorem outer_measure_caratheodory (A : Set G) :
    (measurable_set_of μ.outer_measure.caratheodory) A ↔
      ∀ U : Opens G, μ.outer_measure (U ∩ A) + μ.outer_measure (U \ A) ≤ μ.outer_measure U :=
  by
  rw [opens.forall]
  apply induced_outer_measure_caratheodory
  apply inner_content_Union_nat
  apply inner_content_mono'
#align outer_measure_caratheodory outer_measure_caratheodory
mono:
theorem mono (K₁ K₂ : Compacts G) (h : (K₁ : Set G) ⊆ K₂) : μ K₁ ≤ μ K₂ := by simp [apply_eq_coe_to_fun, μ.mono' _ _ h]
#align mono mono
measure_eq_content_of_regular:
/-- If `μ` is a regular content, then the measure induced by `μ` will agree with `μ`
  on compact sets.-/
theorem measure_eq_content_of_regular (H : measure_theory.content.content_regular μ) (K : TopologicalSpace.Compacts G) :
    μ.measure ↑K = μ K := by
  refine' le_antisymm _ _
  · apply ENNReal.le_of_forall_pos_le_add
    intro ε εpos content_K_finite
    obtain ⟨K', K'_hyp⟩ := content_regular_exists_compact μ H K (ne_bot_of_gt εpos)
    calc
      μ.measure ↑K ≤ μ.measure (interior ↑K') := _
      _ ≤ μ K' := _
      _ ≤ μ K + ε := K'_hyp.right
      
    · rw [μ.measure_apply isOpen_interior.measurable_set, μ.measure_apply K.is_compact.measurable_set]
      exact μ.outer_measure.mono K'_hyp.left
    · rw [μ.measure_apply (is_open.measurable_set isOpen_interior)]
      exact μ.outer_measure_interior_compacts K'
  · rw [μ.measure_apply (is_compact.measurable_set K.is_compact)]
    exact μ.le_outer_measure_compacts K
#align measure_eq_content_of_regular measure_eq_content_of_regular
measure_apply:
theorem measure_apply {s : Set G} (hs : MeasurableSet s) : μ.measure s = μ.outer_measure s :=
  toMeasure_apply _ _ hs
#align measure_apply measure_apply
lt_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
theorem lt_top (K : Compacts G) : μ K < ennreal.top :=
  ENNReal.coe_lt_top
#align lt_top lt_top
le_outer_measure_compacts:
theorem le_outer_measure_compacts (K : Compacts G) : μ K ≤ μ.outer_measure K :=
  by
  rw [content.outer_measure, induced_outer_measure_eq_infi]
  · exact le_infᵢ fun U => le_infᵢ fun hU => le_infᵢ <| μ.le_inner_content K ⟨U, hU⟩
  · exact μ.inner_content_Union_nat
  · exact μ.inner_content_mono
#align le_outer_measure_compacts le_outer_measure_compacts
le_inner_content:
theorem le_inner_content (K : Compacts G) (U : Opens G) (h2 : (K : Set G) ⊆ U) : μ K ≤ μ.inner_content U :=
  le_supᵢ_of_le K <| le_supᵢ _ h2
#align le_inner_content le_inner_content
is_mul_left_invariant_outer_measure:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
@[to_additive]
theorem is_mul_left_invariant_outer_measure [Group G] [TopologicalGroup G]
    (h : ∀ (g : G) {K : Compacts G}, μ (K.map _ <| continuous_mul_left g) = μ K) (g : G) (A : Set G) :
    μ.outer_measure («expr ⁻¹' » (fun h => g * h) A) = μ.outer_measure A := by
  convert μ.outer_measure_preimage (Homeomorph.mulLeft g) (fun K => h g) A
#align is_mul_left_invariant_outer_measure is_mul_left_invariant_outer_measure
is_mul_left_invariant_inner_content:
@[to_additive]
theorem is_mul_left_invariant_inner_content [Group G] [TopologicalGroup G]
    (h : ∀ (g : G) {K : Compacts G}, μ (K.map _ <| continuous_mul_left g) = μ K) (g : G) (U : Opens G) :
    μ.inner_content (Opens.comap (Homeomorph.mulLeft g).to_continuous_map U) = μ.inner_content U := by
  convert μ.inner_content_comap (Homeomorph.mulLeft g) (fun K => h g) U
#align is_mul_left_invariant_inner_content is_mul_left_invariant_inner_content
inner_content_pos_of_is_mul_left_invaria:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
@[to_additive]
theorem inner_content_pos_of_is_mul_left_invariant [T2Space G] [Group G] [TopologicalGroup G]
    (h3 : ∀ (g : G) {K : Compacts G}, μ (K.map _ <| continuous_mul_left g) = μ K) (K : Compacts G) (hK : μ K ≠ 0)
    (U : Opens G) (hU : (U : Set G).nonempty) : 0 < μ.inner_content U :=
  by
  have : (interior (U : Set G)).nonempty
  rwa [U.is_open.interior_eq]
  rcases compact_covered_by_mul_left_translates K.2 this with ⟨s, hs⟩
  suffices μ K ≤ s.card * μ.inner_content U by exact (ennreal.mul_pos_iff.mp <| hK.bot_lt.trans_le this).2
  have :
    (K : Set G) ⊆
      ↑(«expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »"
          (opens.comap (Homeomorph.mulLeft g).to_continuous_map U)) :=
    by simpa only [opens.supr_def, opens.coe_comap, Subtype.coe_mk]
  refine' (μ.le_inner_content _ _ this).trans _
  refine' (rel_supᵢ_sum μ.inner_content μ.inner_content_bot (· ≤ ·) μ.inner_content_Sup_nat _ _).trans _
  simp only [μ.is_mul_left_invariant_inner_content h3, Finset.sum_const, nsmul_eq_mul, le_refl]
#align inner_content_pos_of_is_mul_left_invariant inner_content_pos_of_is_mul_left_invariant
inner_content_of_is_compact:
theorem inner_content_of_is_compact {K : Set G} (h1K : IsCompact K) (h2K : IsOpen K) :
    μ.inner_content ⟨K, h2K⟩ = μ ⟨K, h1K⟩ :=
  le_antisymm (supᵢ₂_le fun K' hK' => μ.mono _ ⟨K, h1K⟩ hK') (μ.le_inner_content _ _ Subset.rfl)
#align inner_content_of_is_compact inner_content_of_is_compact
inner_content_mono':
theorem inner_content_mono' ⦃U V : Set G⦄ (hU : IsOpen U) (hV : IsOpen V) (h2 : U ⊆ V) :
    μ.inner_content ⟨U, hU⟩ ≤ μ.inner_content ⟨V, hV⟩ :=
  bsupᵢ_mono fun K hK => hK.trans h2
#align inner_content_mono' inner_content_mono'
inner_content_mono:
/-- This is "unbundled", because that it required for the API of `induced_outer_measure`. -/
theorem inner_content_mono ⦃U V : Set G⦄ (hU : IsOpen U) (hV : IsOpen V) (h2 : U ⊆ V) :
    μ.inner_content ⟨U, hU⟩ ≤ μ.inner_content ⟨V, hV⟩ :=
  bsupᵢ_mono fun K hK => hK.trans h2
#align inner_content_mono inner_content_mono
inner_content_le:
theorem inner_content_le (U : Opens G) (K : Compacts G) (h2 : (U : Set G) ⊆ K) : μ.inner_content U ≤ μ K :=
  supᵢ₂_le fun K' hK' => μ.mono _ _ (Subset.trans hK' h2)
#align inner_content_le inner_content_le
inner_content_exists_compact:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
theorem inner_content_exists_compact {U : Opens G} (hU : μ.inner_content U ≠ ennreal.top) {ε : nnreal} (hε : ε ≠ 0) :
    ∃ K : Compacts G, (K : Set G) ⊆ U ∧ μ.inner_content U ≤ μ K + ε :=
  by
  have h'ε := ENNReal.coe_ne_zero.2 hε
  cases le_or_lt (μ.inner_content U) ε
  · exact ⟨«expr⊥», empty_subset _, le_add_left h⟩
  have := ENNReal.sub_lt_self hU h.ne_bot h'ε
  conv at this =>
    rhs
    rw [inner_content];
  simp only [lt_supᵢ_iff] at this
  rcases this with ⟨U, h1U, h2U⟩; refine' ⟨U, h1U, _⟩
  rw [← tsub_le_iff_right]; exact le_of_lt h2U
#align inner_content_exists_compact inner_content_exists_compact
inner_content_comap:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ₜ » -/
theorem inner_content_comap (f : «expr ≃ₜ » G G) (h : ∀ ⦃K : Compacts G⦄, μ (K.map f f.continuous) = μ K)
    (U : Opens G) : μ.inner_content (Opens.comap f.to_continuous_map U) = μ.inner_content U :=
  by
  refine' (compacts.equiv f).surjective.supr_congr _ fun K => supᵢ_congr_Prop image_subset_iff _
  intro hK; simp only [Equiv.coe_fn_mk, Subtype.mk_eq_mk, ENNReal.coe_eq_coe, compacts.equiv]
  apply h
#align inner_content_comap inner_content_comap
inner_content_bot:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
theorem inner_content_bot : μ.inner_content («expr⊥») = 0 :=
  by
  refine' le_antisymm _ (zero_le _)
  rw [← μ.empty]
  refine' supᵢ₂_le fun K hK => _
  have : K = «expr⊥» := by
    ext1
    rw [subset_empty_iff.mp hK, compacts.coe_bot]
  rw [this]
  rfl
#align inner_content_bot inner_content_bot
inner_content_Union_nat:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , » -/
/-- The inner content of a union of sets is at most the sum of the individual inner contents.
  This is the "unbundled" version of `inner_content_Sup_nat`.
  It required for the API of `induced_outer_measure`. -/
theorem inner_content_Union_nat [T2Space G] ⦃U : ℕ → Set G⦄ (hU : ∀ i : ℕ, IsOpen (U i)) :
    μ.inner_content
        ⟨«expr⋃ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⋃ , »" (U i),
          isOpen_unionᵢ hU⟩ ≤
      «expr∑' , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , »"
        (μ.inner_content ⟨U i, hU i⟩) :=
  by
  have := μ.inner_content_Sup_nat fun i => ⟨U i, hU i⟩
  rwa [opens.supr_def] at this
#align inner_content_Union_nat inner_content_Union_nat
inner_content_Sup_nat:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , » -/
/-- The inner content of a supremum of opens is at most the sum of the individual inner
contents. -/
theorem inner_content_Sup_nat [T2Space G] (U : ℕ → Opens G) :
    μ.inner_content
        («expr⨆ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨆ , »" (U i)) ≤
      «expr∑' , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∑' , »"
        (μ.inner_content (U i)) :=
  by
  have h3 : ∀ (t : Finset ℕ) (K : ℕ → compacts G), μ (t.sup K) ≤ t.sum fun i => μ (K i) :=
    by
    intro t K
    refine' Finset.induction_on t _ _
    · simp only [μ.empty, nonpos_iff_eq_zero, Finset.sum_empty, Finset.sup_empty]
    · intro n s hn ih
      rw [Finset.sup_insert, Finset.sum_insert hn]
      exact le_trans (μ.sup_le _ _) (add_le_add_left ih _)
  refine' supᵢ₂_le fun K hK => _
  obtain ⟨t, ht⟩ := K.is_compact.elim_finite_subcover _ (fun i => (U i).is_open) _
  swap
  · rwa [← opens.coe_supr]
  rcases K.is_compact.finite_compact_cover t (coe ∘ U) (fun i _ => (U _).is_open) (by simp only [ht]) with
    ⟨K', h1K', h2K', h3K'⟩
  let L : ℕ → compacts G := fun n => ⟨K' n, h1K' n⟩
  convert le_trans (h3 t L) _
  · ext1
    rw [compacts.coe_finset_sup, Finset.sup_eq_supᵢ]
    exact h3K'
  refine' le_trans (Finset.sum_le_sum _) (ENNReal.sum_le_tsum t)
  intro i hi
  refine' le_trans _ (le_supᵢ _ (L i))
  refine' le_trans _ (le_supᵢ _ (h2K' i))
  rfl
#align inner_content_Sup_nat inner_content_Sup_nat
content_regular_exists_compact:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , » -/
theorem content_regular_exists_compact (H : content_regular μ) (K : TopologicalSpace.Compacts G) {ε : NNReal}
    (hε : ε ≠ 0) : ∃ K' : TopologicalSpace.Compacts G, K.carrier ⊆ interior K'.carrier ∧ μ K' ≤ μ K + ε :=
  by
  by_contra hc
  simp only [not_exists, not_and, not_le] at hc
  have lower_bound_infi :
    μ K + ε ≤ «expr⨅ , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr⨅ , »" (μ K') :=
    le_infᵢ fun K' => le_infᵢ fun K'_hyp => le_of_lt (hc K' K'_hyp)
  rw [← H] at lower_bound_infi
  exact
    (lt_self_iff_false (μ K)).mp
      (lt_of_le_of_lt' lower_bound_infi (ENNReal.lt_add_right (ne_top_of_lt (μ.lt_top K)) (ennreal.coe_ne_zero.mpr hε)))
#align content_regular_exists_compact content_regular_exists_compact
borel_le_caratheodory:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/-- For the outer measure coming from a content, all Borel sets are measurable. -/
theorem borel_le_caratheodory : S ≤ μ.outer_measure.caratheodory :=
  by
  rw [@borel_space.measurable_eq G _ _]
  refine' MeasurableSpace.generateFrom_le _
  intro U hU
  rw [μ.outer_measure_caratheodory]
  intro U'
  rw [μ.outer_measure_of_is_open ((U' : Set G) ∩ U) (U'.is_open.inter hU)]
  simp only [inner_content, supᵢ_subtype']
  rw [opens.coe_mk]
  haveI : Nonempty { L : compacts G // (L : Set G) ⊆ U' ∩ U } := ⟨⟨«expr⊥», empty_subset _⟩⟩
  rw [ENNReal.supᵢ_add]
  refine' supᵢ_le _
  rintro ⟨L, hL⟩
  simp only [subset_inter_iff] at hL
  have : ↑U' \ U ⊆ U' \ L := diff_subset_diff_right hL.2
  refine' le_trans (add_le_add_left (μ.outer_measure.mono' this) _) _
  rw [μ.outer_measure_of_is_open (↑U' \ L) (IsOpen.sdiff U'.2 L.2.is_closed)]
  simp only [inner_content, supᵢ_subtype']
  rw [opens.coe_mk]
  haveI : Nonempty { M : compacts G // (M : Set G) ⊆ ↑U' \ L } := ⟨⟨«expr⊥», empty_subset _⟩⟩
  rw [ENNReal.add_supᵢ]
  refine' supᵢ_le _
  rintro ⟨M, hM⟩
  simp only [subset_diff] at hM
  have : (↑(«expr ⊔ » L M) : Set G) ⊆ U' := by simp only [union_subset_iff, compacts.coe_sup, hM, hL, and_self_iff]
  rw [μ.outer_measure_of_is_open (↑U') U'.2]
  refine' le_trans (ge_of_eq _) (μ.le_inner_content _ _ this)
  exact μ.sup_disjoint _ _ hM.2.symm
#align borel_le_caratheodory borel_le_caratheodory
apply_eq_coe_to_fun:
/-
Copyright (c) 2020 Floris van Doorn. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Floris van Doorn
-/
theorem apply_eq_coe_to_fun (K : Compacts G) : μ K = μ.to_fun K :=
  rfl
#align apply_eq_coe_to_fun apply_eq_coe_to_fun
Empty:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
#print Empty /-
theorem Empty : μ («expr⊥») = 0 := by
  have := μ.sup_disjoint' («expr⊥») («expr⊥»)
  simpa [apply_eq_coe_to_fun] using this
#align empty Empty
-/
